name: CandidaAurisInfectionTestsForCandidaAurisNucleicAcid
title: Candida auris Infection (Tests for Candida auris Nucleic Acid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Candida auris nucleic acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Candida auris nucleic acid;  

LOINC search: ‘’Candida auris Nucleic”),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
